name: DK Hotel
description:
You're a janitor at DK Hotel. Can you survive the night AND finish your shift on time? 

Diddy Kong, Lanky Kong, King K. Rool, and Donkey Kong are angry!

This is a horror game using characters from the Donkey Kong series with a style loosely comparable to FNAF (not enough to be called a FNAF fangame).

Edit: New build, fixed some bugs and made the sweeping easier.
